column1: cpi_Direction_vision_1_The company's vision is very clear.
cpi_Direction_vision_2_I can summarize the company's vision to someone I meet.
cpi_Direction_vision_3_I feel inspired by the company's vision.
cpi_Direction_vision_4_Leaders are passionate about the company's vision.
cpi_Direction_vision_5_Leaders are guided by the company's vision.
cpi_Direction_strategy_1_I have confidence in the company's strategy.
cpi_Direction_strategy_2_I know what my company wants to achieve in the next year.
cpi_Direction_strategy_3_This company knows how to get the results it is looking for.
cpi_Direction_strategy_4_We know what our next step is for improving our capabilities.
cpi_Direction_strategy_5_Leadership effectively connects my work to the company goals.
cpi_Direction_leadership_1_I have a great deal of confidence in the leadership of this company.
cpi_Direction_leadership_2_Company leaders impact the attitude and culture of the entire company.
cpi_Direction_leadership_3_The leadership of this company is fantastic in comparison to the leadership of other organizations I've been involved with.
cpi_Direction_leadership_4_Leaders find the time to get to know the employees.
cpi_Direction_leadership_5_I have confidence in the decision making of company leaders.
cpi_Operations_adaptability_1_We deal with the same problems again and again.*
cpi_Operations_adaptability_2_Company changes usually have a positive impact on me.
cpi_Operations_adaptability_3_People look to pass the blame when something goes wrong.*
cpi_Operations_adaptability_4_If an issue arises, people mostly remain calm and focused.
cpi_Operations_adaptability_5_We use feedback from customers to improve our services.
cpi_Operations_performance_1_I have real time access to business i.
cpi_Operations_performance_2_My team uses performance measures (i.e. key performance indicators).
cpi_Operations_performance_3_We are recognized for our successes.
cpi_Operations_performance_4_We have a clear sense at all times whether or not we're meeting our objectives.
cpi_Operations_performance_5_We are held accountable for our performance.
cpi_Operations_systems_1_I often use 'workarounds' instead of the company's established systems.*
cpi_Operations_systems_2_It often takes too long to get the information I need.*
cpi_Operations_systems_3_Oftentimes, I have to take care of things that shouldn't be my responsibility.*
cpi_Operations_systems_4_I know who to go to when I have concerns about our systems/processes.
cpi_Operations_systems_5_I follow the company's standardized procedures.
cpi_People_teamwork_1_Our team consistently meets our goals.
cpi_People_teamwork_2_Our work would be better if we collaborated more.
cpi_People_teamwork_3_Our skills complement each other well.
cpi_People_teamwork_4_There's a real sense that I am part of a team.
cpi_People_teamwork_5_Our company has a spirit of teamwork and cooperation.
cpi_People_talent_1_My company does a good job of hiring the right people for the right jobs.
cpi_People_talent_2_I am confident my performance affects my compensation.
cpi_People_talent_3_I get along well with my supervisor.
cpi_People_talent_4_Performance reviews are a waste of time.*
cpi_People_talent_5_Based on my experience, the company does a great job of acclimating new employees.
cpi_People_development_1_I get helpful feedback from my supervisor on a regular basis.
cpi_People_development_2_I am consistently improving at my job.
cpi_People_development_3_People here are always willing to help me learn.
cpi_People_development_4_The company invests in employees learning new skills.
cpi_People_development_5_I have grown professionally during my time with this company.
cpi_Engagement_fit_1_My job role is always extremely clear.
cpi_Engagement_fit_2_I am very frequently overwhelmed at work.*
cpi_Engagement_fit_3_My job is a great fit for my skills and strengths.
cpi_Engagement_fit_4_I embrace the company's core values.
cpi_Engagement_fit_5_I look forward to going to work.
cpi_Engagement_customer_1_I believe in the products or services we provide.
cpi_Engagement_customer_2_I respond to customer needs as quickly as possible.
cpi_Engagement_customer_3_I build great relationships with my customers.
cpi_Engagement_customer_4_I'm disappointed if I don't meet my customers' expectations.
cpi_Engagement_customer_5_I seek feedback from customers to improve our products or services.
cpi_Engagement_climate_1_My opinions are heard and valued.
cpi_Engagement_climate_2_I am confident that leadership understands what I do.
cpi_Engagement_climate_3_I am very comfortable letting my supervisor know when I've made a mistake.
cpi_Engagement_climate_4_I trust my supervisor has my best interest in mind.
extra_pos_positivity_1_People in my organization express genuine gratitude toward one another.
extra_pos_positivity_2_I practice mindfulness by staying in the present moment while doing my work.
extra_pos_positivity_3_People I work with generally feel optimistic about the organization's future.
extra_pos_positivity_4_People that I work with care about my happiness and well-being.
extra_pos_positivity_5_I feel inspired every day to do my best work.
